thread.title: AXA buys XL for $15 bln in latest insurance mega-deal

title: AXA buys XL for $15 bln in latest insurance mega-deal
text:
AXA buys XL for $15 bln in latest insurance mega-deal 10:22am EST - 01:20 
France's AXA has moved to buy Bermuda-based XL Group for $15.3 billion to create what it said would be a world leader in property and casualty insurance. As Laura Frykberg reports, Europe's second-biggest insurer offered $57.60 for each XL share, a 33 percent premium to Friday's closing price.   
France's AXA has moved to buy Bermuda-based XL Group for $15.3 billion to create what it said would be a world leader in property and casualty insurance. As Laura Frykberg reports, Europe's second-biggest insurer offered $57.60 for each XL share, a 33 percent premium to Friday's closing price.  //reut.rs/2oQTbTX
